title: groovy control file does not include ros-groovy-robot-state-publisher

content.raw:
It's missing from [precise+groovy and quantal+groovy control file](#!/osrf/drcsim-release/src/087e0deb724b3ab50c9ea80f0d9cc4919ffdbf2c/ubuntu/debian/control?at=default).

Ok for [raring+hydro control file](#!/osrf/drcsim-release/src/087e0deb724b3ab50c9ea80f0d9cc4919ffdbf2c/raring/debian/control?at=default#cl-28)

Without it,
~~~
roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas_v3_sandia_hands.launch 
~~~
results in
~~~
process[sandia_hands/l_hand/simple_grasp_left-3]: started with pid [5842]
process[sandia_hands/r_hand/simple_grasp_right-4]: started with pid [5843]
ERROR: cannot launch node of type [robot_state_publisher/state_publisher]: robot_state_publisher
ROS path [0]=/opt/ros/groovy/share/ros
ROS path [1]=/home/hsu/projects/catkin_drcsim_issue_366/install/share
ROS path [2]=/home/hsu/projects/catkin_drcsim_issue_366/install/stacks
ROS path [3]=/opt/ros/groovy/share
ROS path [4]=/opt/ros/groovy/stacks
ERROR: cannot launch node of type [robot_state_publisher/state_publisher]: robot_state_publisher
ROS path [0]=/opt/ros/groovy/share/ros
ROS path [1]=/home/hsu/projects/catkin_drcsim_issue_366/install/share
ROS path [2]=/home/hsu/projects/catkin_drcsim_issue_366/install/stacks
ROS path [3]=/opt/ros/groovy/share
ROS path [4]=/opt/ros/groovy/stacks
process[sandia_hands/l_hand/camera/stereo_proc-7]: started with pid [5851]
process[sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/stereo_proc-8]: started with pid [5866]
ERROR: cannot launch node of type [robot_state_publisher/state_publisher]: robot_state_publisher
ROS path [0]=/opt/ros/groovy/share/ros
ROS path [1]=/home/hsu/projects/catkin_drcsim_issue_366/install/share
ROS path [2]=/home/hsu/projects/catkin_drcsim_issue_366/install/stacks
ROS path [3]=/opt/ros/groovy/share
ROS path [4]=/opt/ros/groovy/stacks
ERROR: cannot launch node of type [robot_state_publisher/state_publisher]: robot_state_publisher
ROS path [0]=/opt/ros/groovy/share/ros
ROS path [1]=/home/hsu/projects/catkin_drcsim_issue_366/install/share
ROS path [2]=/home/hsu/projects/catkin_drcsim_issue_366/install/stacks
ROS path [3]=/opt/ros/groovy/share
ROS path [4]=/opt/ros/groovy/stacks
~~~
content.html:
It's missing from precise+groovy and quantal+groovy control file.

Ok for raring+hydro control file

Without it,

roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas_v3_sandia_hands.launch

results in
